archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0599
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As an existing customer, I want to be notified of how many international calling minutes I have left, when I make an international call, so that I can purchase more if I need to.

properties.value: Home Phone international calling minutes balance

What should trigger the notification? "When I make an international call" suggests that it is beginning of the call. OOTB solution is to show Customer how many international minutes are available in SC and to trigger notification if Customer goes below defined threshold in International minutes pool. Is it for subscription model (bundle of minutes)? Not exactly when someone makes a call, but notification at a certain threshold (like 80%). Result from OCS dedicated session: VF to provide detailed specification of the interface to check the options how the call could be redirected to IVR. The Comarch will check if it is possible from OCS side. Diane to check the requirements

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
